metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2910 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability exists in the xls_addCellfunction of libxls 2.0. A specially crafted xls file can cause a memorycorruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can sendmalicious xls file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
